data.what_is: AnalytixLabs is a Data Science and Big Data training institute.
data.product_description: AnalytixLabs is a Data Science and Big Data training institute.

initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
I have completed Data Science with python from AnalytixLabs. I have never regretted my choice since the day I joined AnalytixLabs. And trust me whosoever is planning to learn must choose AnalytixLabs.

The kind of support and guidance I receive from the course mentors is really amazing. They never feel irritated or bored while explaining.

Enjoyed my learning time with AnalytixLabs.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
The guidance of mentors is unexplainable as it is really amazing.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
I haven't experienced anything to dislike.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
All Data Science related Business problem.

initial_reviews.review_title: Enriching experience and amazing course content
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
Understanding predictive modeling and the application in real-world with hands on projects and assignments

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
1. The course content, assignments, and projects
2. The faculty- The way Chandra Sir taught data science combining the concepts with business acumen, helped me to gain an idea about the way data science is used in real life apart from the mathematical concepts behind each algorithm

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Nothing really--it was a perfect experience for me

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
Just go for it. They know what they are doing

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. Statistics, Mathematics, SQL
2. tableau and excel
3. Predictive Modelling

Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
Th institute helped me with gaining knowledge of analytical tools and statistics

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
the level of difficulty, assignments and case studies are design with. it will make you invest more time learning and  understanding the topics.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
they solely provides analytical courses you won't find any other technological related courses here.

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
If you are aiming to build a career in analytics, Analytixlabs is one of the best institute in gurgaon. I joined Alabs right after completing my engineering where i was guided to pursue SAS & R data science course along with Tableau by their counselling team.
Alabs provides extremely good course content, class-room/ online based lectures followed by topic wise assignments and case studies. Throughout the course the instructors were very supportive.In case of doubt sessions, they provided me with assistance over emails, extra time after classes and even on calls.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
found a job!

Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
I had a good experience with Analytix labs. I am extremely satisfied with the classes. All the sessions were very good. I joined Business Analytix 360, which covers all the required tools for data science. The trainers are more knowledgeable having real time experience, providing good support, clarifying the query then and there with patience and also thought us in a friendly manner. I believe that analytix labs is best institute for everyone who are willing to establish themselves in data science. Definitely they guide us in a right path in career. The course content is worth for money and they covered all the topics more elaborately which is required in real time scenario. Materials and videos in LMS was very useful for me to read the topics again. I will definitely suggest my friends and collegue who is interested in learning data science. My special thanks to Analytix labs and all the trainers who covered Python, R, Tableau, SQL, Machine learning with R and Python.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Trainers support, materials and easy access to LMS

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
nothing to say. i am fully satisfied with this course

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
I suggest every one because i am fully satisfied with this institute. they fullfiled my requirements.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
assignments and case studies were really useful. now i am working as a data scientist.  The topics were really useful and it is based on real time project.

Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
I had enrolled here for BA 360 course where they taught me Data Analytics & Visualization

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Professionalism and guidance and the quality of education.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Nothing as such as they're very dedicated towards their work

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
I had enrolled here for BA 360 course and I have a very good experience with faculty and entire team throughout the entire course. I have been able to grab an opportunity with an MNC. They provide very good knowledge of each subjects whatever they have include in course.
So I would recommend you to go ahead for it if you're looking for guidance and knowledge to have a career in Data Science.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
They provide very good knowledge of each and every subjects whatever they have included in module.

initial_reviews.review_title: Superb trainers with  great knowledge and experience
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
I opted for  bootcamp 360 course and it was a great experience at analytixlabs . Being from non- technical background i never felt that i was not able to connect, trainers taught everything from scratch with commendable efforts.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
The faculty here at analytixlabs is very cooperative, experienced and actually take pain to make the trainees understand  the concepts .

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
I highly recommend to go for analytixlabs it's a great launchpad to start your career in data science

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
I got the complete knowledge from basic to advance in very effective manner.

Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
I took Data Science Specialization using R and Python course from Analytixlabs and Data Visualization using Tableau by online mode but I was a bit skeptical about it. But during the training, I found this more convenient as training sessions are live, highly interactive and well structured. The training was comprehensive covering basics as well as advanced topics.

For Placements Assistance - They help by understanding the career ambitions and providing full support in getting those ambitions and building a reputed profile.
In addition, to attain all this it still needs your own hard work and dedication to make it through.
For Faculty / Trainer guidance -  All staff are fully supportive but Special Thanks to my mentor Sumeet Sir and Chandra Sir for their guidance and continuous support throughout.

Thankyou Alabs

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
For Faculty / Trainer guidance -  All staff are fully supportive but Special Thanks to my mentor Sumeet Sir and Chandra Sir for their guidance and continuous support throughout.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
I do not see any aspects that seem to be disliking.


Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
Highly recommendable. If someone wants to make an entry or switch to the analytics field you should go with Analytixlabs they will help you throughout.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
Also got very extensive and industries related to different case studies like banking, telecom, health, etc to get hands-on exposure to real-time problems

initial_reviews.review_title: Perfect Launchpad for a Career in AI and Data Science
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
Analytix Labs in my opinion is one stop solution for all your Data Science and Big Data Training needs. Everything from faculty,to course content and coverage, case studies and most importantly hands on approach to data science led problem solving is top notch.
You get exposed to structured data science problem solving and how to navigate through all the phases of an AI and Machine Learning Project Lifecycle. This prepares you for real world problem solving in the corporate world. I will recommend Analytix Labs course to anyone who is aspiring for building a successful career in data science. Its a perfect launch pad.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Faculty, Course Content and Depth of Coverage

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Nothing. My experience with Analytix Labs was seamless.

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
Do not hesitate to join Analytix Labs for your training need. You will be ecstatic with your experience here. It will surely set you up for a successful career in data science.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
Machine Learning and Data Science Projects in multiple areas.

Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
I have enrolled for business analytics course.And faculty was very much supportive in solving assignments and case studies.Faculty was very much good in answering all my personal questions as well.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Faculty here has a great amount of experience.Concepts are taught very much in depth right from basics to advanced.All the tools are covered as promised by them.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
All.were pros.No.cons.Would recommend to anyone going for analytics institute.

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
Good institute to join if you want to go for analytics or data science.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
Whatever was taught in my class I was very much about to apply into my work.And because faculty has huge amount of experience they solve all your questions and they share their experience as well .

initial_reviews.review_title: Great Institute for learning Data Science and Analytics from scratch.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
I came to the US to finish do my Masters in Finance and needed to learn various programming languages to assist with my learning. I bought the Data Analytics with R and SAS course and found it very helpful. I was so impressed by their course that I have now purchased the Data Science 360% course and I look forward to be a subject matter specialist. Such skills are very valuable in the IT and Finance industry and I am glad the AnalytixLabs gives it's students relevant training to succeed.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
The case students and the relevance of the material taught is very good! If you follow the classes and do the assignments, you really get a strong grip on the concepts taught.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
I bought the self paced videos and so some of the Q & A between the concept taught was sometimes distract me and unnecessarily drags the length of  the videos.

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
If you are interested in Data Science or Data Analytics... This is the place for you!

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
I used their videos to complements my Masters degree... they honestly helped to a great extent in helping build a strong foundation for me.

initial_reviews.review_title: Took data science in SAS and R
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
Took data science in sas and R and that's been helpful in giving a strong base.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
The institute has been periodically updating its course to meet industry standards.
They also have good interview support facility.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Need more support on conceptual aspects. A strong foundation requires good fundamental knowledge which I feel can be given more attention to.
Further, sometimes due to too many questions in class things some sections have to be rushed through.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
Career development in big data.

Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
Students at Analytixlabs were given many projects as a part of course but all those projects were not only interesting but we're informative and conceptual application was present.I would like to do some more projects if given. The project on Linear regression was asked as part of my interview, this was the toughest one of all the projects it took me and my friends more than 15 days but enjoyed doing it.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
I am from Analytixlabs Bangalore, the faculty is present all through the day which helped me to solve my errors and doubts easily. Personally I feel that the concept shared by the faculty is on feild experience. The case studies given were very useful.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Me and my friends who attended the interview the question that was asked in common that was the Gradient Decent Algorithm, but we couldn't answer it , if taught would be helpful for upcoming batches

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
Would recommend to who ever is seeking a  career start in this analytics world.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problems solved were on Linear regression, Logistic regression, segmentation, Forecasting. The projects I have done on all of them were helpful.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best institute for the data science
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
Analytixlab helped me to work on three project which belongs to different domain. And requirements of these domain is very high in the market. They will keep you updated with the things going on in market.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Case studies. Case studies which they share after every topic/class is very helpful to understand all the statistical things you have learned theoretically

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Space, classrooms are bit conjusted.
They should work on these things so that the candidate can utilize the classroom, instead of taking the course online.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
They helped me with one machine learning project which was started in my organization. They guided me while is was building the model , from the scratch

Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
Advance data science course, python, and

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
course curriculum and teaching standard

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
sometimes the video quality wasnt good, need to improve the internet connectivity

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
First of all, I am not a big fan of writing reviews about the institutes, and this is the first time I am writing a review. Because I feel it may be helpful to someone who wants to understand the subject. My case was I have already taken courses on machine learning and data science from coursera and also in my college curriculum. But never understood the full concept and was still diffident about my understanding. Then I decided to go for extra coaching and got to know about analytix labs. I took course of Datascience, initially I thought of skipping the python classes, as I believe to be very good in python, but in the classes I was taught several new things which I didn't know before, the instructor who was teaching us had 10+ years of experience and he shared a very good practical way to look into the things and gave reasons to most of the concepts which we were taught to just remember. The only thing which stopped me taking the course was their fees, and thats where you take the decision, There are already players in the market who are teaching more or less same at the half of the fees. But believe me, the quality here is much better than them. I had taken the same course before joining analytixlabs at the cheaper price and that guy did nothing more than reading from slides. I believe I knew much more than him. Anyways, here it is completely different from the very first class you would come to know what teaching actually means at analytixlabs.
Thanks

initial_reviews.review_title: Great place to learn for working people .
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
Analytixlab helped as much as possible for all task and projects .

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
We can attend the classes from home and classroom . Teacher are good to solve the questions.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Classroom are very small . Cover the syllabus very fast and  late response of queries regarding extend classes or break the classes .

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helped me to learn the new things but still in process of my learning the Analytixlab.

Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
Hey guys, I had joined the data science with python course at Analytix Labs last September and I was impressed with the curriculum and the way they handled each lectures. Every doubt was resolved on time and with such a dedication the team helps us I really feel it is the best place to learn this course. I would recommend all of you to join the institute with any doubts. They are really expert in this field and you can completely trust their work.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
They would never get offended when our doubts are not cleared even after repeated explanations. They understand us make sure that we have cleared our doubts.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
Sometimes the internet connectivity and other participants sound would create disturbance.

What problems is AnalytixLabs Gurgaon solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am learning Data science with python and am enjoying the course as I am under their guidance

Describe the project or task AnalytixLabs Gurgaon helped with:
I have completed the Advanced Big Data Science course formAnalytixLabs. The faulty there is really knowledgeable and help me in gaining new ideas to handle the data and implementing the machine learning techniques.  The assignments provided will help in gaining and sharpening the skills.

What do you like best about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
The case studies that were provided really helped to gain the industry level knowledge. The faculties are always available to help which is one of the most appreciable things and that helped me a lot in clarifying my doubts.

What do you dislike about AnalytixLabs Gurgaon?
I fear, that there is nothing that I would have disliked about the course. This course is perfect for the person who doesn't have any previous experience in data related filed and even more beneficial for the professionals that have been working in the IT industry to sharpen their sills.

Recommendations to others considering AnalytixLabs Gurgaon:
I have completed my training form this branch and will definitely recommend because of the extraordinary faculty skills.
